tool_description: Generates comprehensive reading progress reports combining multiple metrics, goals, and analytics into formatted summaries.

report_type.description: Type of report: daily, weekly, monthly, or custom

start_date.description: Start date for the report period

end_date.description: End date for the report period

include_goals.description: Whether to include goal progress in the report

format_type.description: Output format: summary, detailed, or minimal

error_messages: Invalid user_id: User identifier cannot be empty
Invalid report_type: Must be one of 'daily', 'weekly', 'monthly', or 'custom'
Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date and both must be valid date-time strings
Invalid format_type: Must be one of 'summary', 'detailed', or 'minimal'
Date range too large: Custom reports cannot exceed 365 days
usage: Specify user_id, report_type, start_date, and end_date to generate a progress report. Use boolean flags to control report sections and format_type to adjust detail level.

summary_statistics.description: Key statistics summary for the report period

goal_achievements.description: List of goal achievements and milestones

report_date.description: Date and time when the report was generated
